name: Doomsectoid 3D (Project 4)
description:
The modifications I implemented for this game include:

1. Created a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.

2. Added multiple additional levels and tied them in to create a logical progression in the game.

3. Created a new UI element that tracks the amount of enemies killed. (A kill counter)

Created by: Ben Salva for CAS 117

Guidance by:

Brian Winn & Declan McClintock

*Warning* If you are playing this game in the browser the mouse sensitivity is very high for some reason so I recommend manually lowering your mouse sensitivity before play.
